RumorFact.Text: Ore mined on Timber Hearth was treated at a forge on Hollow's Lantern.
A Nomai computer reported increased volcanic activity and unstable lava levels on Hollow's Lantern.
A Nomai named Pye allowed herself to be sealed into a diving bell, and lowered into the lava at this site for some sort of test.

ExploreFact.Text: The Nomai lowered a diving bell into the lava at this site. They concluded that a protective shell crafted from this ore would be able to withstand a supernova.
A supernova radiates immense amounts of heat, enough to melt away the toughest of materials.
Data from the Nomai's elders allowed them to use the deepest point of the lava pool to test using temperatures equal to that of a supernova.
